use nyc_taxi

create EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_green_delta
    with(
        LOCATION='abfss://nyc-taxi-data@nyctaxistorageadls2.dfs.core.windows.net/raw'
        )

WITH trip_data_analysis AS
(
    SELECT
        trip_zone.borough,
        count(1) AS total_trips,
        SUM(CASE payment_type_detail.payment_type_desc WHEN 'Credit card' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as 'card_trips',
        SUM(CASE payment_type_detail.payment_type_desc WHEN 'Cash' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as 'cash_trips'
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'trip_data_green_delta',
            DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_green_delta',
            FORMAT = 'delta'
        ) 
        WITH(
            year varchar(4),
            month varchar(4),  
            PULocationID INT,
            payment_type INT,
            trip_type INT
            ) AS [trip_data]
    JOIN 
        OPENROWSET(
                BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
                DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
                FORMAT = 'CSV',
                PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
                FIRST_ROW=2
            )
            with (location_id  SMALLINT 1,
                borough VARCHAR(100) 2,
                zone VARCHAR(100) 3,
                service_zone VARCHAR(100) 4
                ) AS [trip_zone]
        ON trip_data.PULocationID=trip_zone.location_id
    JOIN
            OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'payment_type.json',
            DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
            FORMAT='CSV',
            FIELDTERMINATOR='0x0b',
            FIELDQUOTE='0x0b')
            with  
                (
                    jsondata NVARCHAR(Max) 
                ) AS payment_type
            CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsondata)
            with
            (
                payment_type SMALLINT,
                payment_type_desc VARCHAR(25)
            ) AS [payment_type_detail]
        ON trip_data.payment_type=payment_type_detail.payment_type
    GROUP BY   trip_zone.borough
)

select 
    borough,
    total_trips, 
    cash_trips,
    card_trips,
    ROUND(((CAST(cash_trips AS FLOAT) / total_trips) * 100),2) AS cash_trip_percentage,
    ROUND(((CAST(card_trips AS FLOAT) / total_trips) * 100),2) AS card_trip_percentage
    from trip_data_analysis
